attributes.action: Abolish RC/Faith schools in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Publicly funded schools specifically for certain religion's have no place in today's Modern World.

Separating children at the tender age of 5 encourages sectarianism, bigotry and racism. It creates narrow-minded views from both sides, but the faith schools are more likely to have this.

Religion is dying. 

If an employer was to tell an applicant they could not get a job because of their colour, there would be outrage. yet, this happens with faith schools.

End it before we create more bigotry.
